faqs.question: How do I get started with this template?
faqs.answer: After purchase, you'll receive a link to the Notion template. Click 'Duplicate' to add it to your workspace, then browse the 161 prompts organized by category. Copy any prompt, paste it into Midjourney, and generate your ad. You can bookmark the page or duplicate it for easy access whenever you need new ad graphics.
